hero.heading: In the heart of the city
hero.text: Terrazas de Golf is an old family residence transformed into a comfortable and welcoming Boutique Hotel, run by its owners with the mission of serving.

intro.heading: Why to stay at Terrazas de Golf?
intro.text1: Terrazas de Golf, former family residence turned into a comfortable boutique hotel since January 2011.
intro.text2: Run by its owners with the mission to serve, inspired by their years of participation as members of a local Rotary Club and their volunteer work assisting children in social risk at the Oratorio Don Bosco Foundation.

toKnow.text: We have a privileged location, and surrounded by nature; near:

list.item1: 5 km (3 miles) from San José International Airport and 9 km (5 miles) from Tobias Bolaños International Airport (SYQ)
list.item2: 200 meters from Wyndham Herradura Conference Center
list.item3: 300 meters from Double Tree Cariari Hotel
list.item5: Adjacent to Cariari Country Club golf course

descriptions.room3: One King bed and deck with private garden
descriptions.room4: Two Queen beds and deck with private garden
descriptions.room7: One Queen bed, 2 sofa beds, for equipped for people with limited ability
descriptions.room8: Two Queen beds and sofa bed
descriptions.room10: Two Queen beds, extra room with sofa bed, balcony and hot tub
descriptions.room11: Studio with one king bed (or two twin beds), sofa bed, living room, tub, refrigerator, electric appliances, tub

include.heading: Deluxe rooms spacious and decorated with luxury and confort for our guests total satisfaction:

bottom.text1: Fare includes breakfast and transportation to and from Juan Santamaria (SJO) and Tobias Bolanos (SYQ) Airports
bottom.text2: Rooms are "triple" when space allows an extra bed or sofa bed. These rooms are

text4.text4-1: Rooms are "triple" when space allows an extra bed or sofa bed. These rooms are

services.heading: Services
services.handicapped: Hotel and room available for handicapped
services.membershipDetails: Access to a private club with 18 holes golf course, olimpic swimming pool, tennis courts
services.massage: Massage service. Contact the reception before your arrival or during your stay
services.airportPickUp: Pick up and drop off from Juan Santamaría (SJO) and Tobías Bolaños Airports (SYQ)
services.medical: Medical or nurse care service upon request
services.medicalDetails: Transportation to one medical appointment, hospital or clinic
services.art: Exhibition and sale of costarican art

location.heading: How to get into Terrazas de Golf?
location.text: You can use either address as a reference:

references.text1: Conference Center Hotel Wyndham Herradura 100 meters South and 100 meters West.
references.text2: From Cariari Country Club main entrance, 300 meters North and 125 meters West.

location.map: You can also use this map:

validation.successBody: We will come back to you if required, thanks!

cookies.heading: We use cookies
cookies.description: By clicking “Accept Cookies,” you agree we can store cookies on your device to help personalize site content, analyze traffic and assist in our marketing to provide the best possible user experience.

footer.heading: Contact Us
footer.address: Costa Rica, Guanacaste, Río Piedras de Tilarán.
